info.title: OpenText Core Threat Detection and Response

get.description:
Lists the top N most risky users, sorted in descending order by riskiness. Enables determining which users in the organization are potential security threats.

#ExamplePrompts Which users are risky?

#ExamplePrompts What were the user threats on 2024-09-03?

#ExamplePrompts Who are the top 3 anomalous users?

#ExamplePrompts Who are the risky users in our company?

#ExamplePrompts Show the users with the most security threats.

#ExamplePrompts List the users with the most suspicious behaviour.

If a specific date in the past is not required, do not provide the date parameter - the latest data is used by default.

Retrieves a summary for an user given an user ID. Enables understanding the details of a risky user through a natural language description. #ExamplePrompts Describe risky user user123.

#ExamplePrompts What was risky about user user123?

#ExamplePrompts Provide a summary of risky user user123?

#ExamplePrompts Give an overview of user user123 and its security risks.

#ExamplePrompts Explain why user123 is considered a risky user.

If a user with the given ID does not exist, a 404 error is returned. If a 404 error is returned, the user should be informed that the requested risky user does not exist.

Lists the top N most risky devices, sorted in descending order by riskiness. Enables determining which devices in the organization are potential security threats.

#ExamplePrompts Which devices are risky?

#ExamplePrompts What were the device threats on 2024-11-12?

#ExamplePrompts Which are the 8 most anomalous devices?

#ExamplePrompts Which are the risky devices in our company?

#ExamplePrompts Show the devices with the most security threats.

#ExamplePrompts List the devices with the most suspicious behavior.

If a specific date in the past is not required, do not provide the date parameter - the latest data is used by default.

Retrieves a summary for a device given an device ID. Enables understanding the details of a risky device through a natural language description. #ExamplePrompts Describe risky device device123.

#ExamplePrompts What was risky about device device123?

#ExamplePrompts Provide a summary of risky device device123.

#ExamplePrompts Give an overview of device device123 and its security risks.

#ExamplePrompts Explain why device123 is considered a risky device.

If a user with the given ID does not exist, a 404 error is returned. If a 404 error is returned, the user should be informed that the requested risky device does not exist.

get.summary: List the most risky rare process executions
get.description:
Lists the top N most risky rare process executions, sorted in descending order by riskiness. Enables determining which process executions are potential security threats. A rare process execution alert is created when a user executes a program that the user has rarely or never executed in the past.

#ExamplePrompts Which process executions are risky?

#ExamplePrompts Which were the most risky rare process executions on 2024-10-02?

#ExamplePrompts Which are the 12 most interesting rare process executions?

#ExamplePrompts What are some risky processes?

#ExamplePrompts List the most risky rare process executions.

#ExamplePrompts Show the rare process executions with the highest risk scores.

The user can reference the alert IDs in the response to retrieve a threat summary for a rare process execution using 'GET /threats/rare-process-executions/{alert_id}/summary/'.

If a specific date in the past is not required, do not provide the date parameter - the latest data is used by default.

get.summary: Retrieve a threat summary for a rare process execution given an alert ID
get.description:
Retrieves a threat summary for a rare process execution given an alert ID. Enables understanding the details of a risky process execution through a natural language description. A rare process execution alert is created when a user executes a program that the user has rarely or never executed in the past.

#ExamplePrompts Describe the rare process execution with alert id 98765432.

#ExamplePrompts What was risky about rare process execution 98765432?

#ExamplePrompts Provide a summary of rare process execution 98765432.

#ExamplePrompts Why was rare process execution 98765432 considered risky?

#ExamplePrompts Explain why rare process execution 98765432 was identified as a risky process.

If a rare process execution alert with the given ID does not exist, a 404 error is returned. If a 404 error is returned, the user should be informed that the requested rare process execution alert does not exist.

parameters.name: alert_id

schema.title: Rare Process ID
schema.description: A unique globalEventId associated with the rare process alert

parameters.description: A unique globalEventId associated with the rare process alert

get.description:
Retrieves a summary for organization.Enables understanding the details of riskiness of organization in a natural language description. #ExamplePrompts Describe how risky is the organization? 

#ExamplePrompts What was risky about the organization?

#ExamplePrompts Summarize the risk factors of the organization.

#ExamplePrompts Give an overview of the organization's security risks.

#ExamplePrompts What is the organization's overall security risk?

If a 404 error is returned, the user should be informed that the requested summary does not exist.
